short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension uses AI to provide diversity ratings to films and tv shows on streaming services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tell us how you want to diversify your media, then let our advanced AI rate film's representation based on how you're trying to consciously consume. Learn more at diversifymymedia.com
